examples.title: Orbeon Forms - Form Builder and Demo Forms
examples.example: Orbeon Form Builder is the Orbeon Forms visual form designer. It allows you to build and deploy forms in minutes right from your web browser.

The Bookshelf form shows image attachments, rich text, repeating form fields, and Form Runner features such as as-you-type validation, error summary, localization, automatic preview page and automatic PDF generation.

The DMV-14 form is based on a real-life form (a California Department of Motor Vehicles form). It shows data capture and validation, repeating sections, and generating great-looking PDF from templates.
View the Orbeon Forms XForms and custom controls in action within Form Runner.
The Contact form is a simple form designed with Form Builder. It can be entirely created in about 10 minutes as shown in the Form Builder screencast.
Go to XForms Controls & Demo Apps
